page.title: 02FARM SURVEY
page.content: Our class carried out a survey of all the farms within this area of the map. We first of all drew up a questionnaire to find out how the land was used. We sent an explanatory letter, the questionnaire and a map to each farmer, with a request for them to fill in all the details, mark the extent of the farm on the map, and return the information to us for collation. Some of the farmers were visited by groups of children. The percentage of land in this area used for the various crops was as follows: GRAZING 49%,SILAGE 30%,HAY 6%,GRAINS 15%. Althogh a variety of stock was kept such as a few ducks and hens these were for home uses. Almost all the farmers kept dairy herds, while on the higher groundsome farmers kept sheep.
